attributes.action: launch an immediate enquiry into BBC World's announcement of the collapse of WTC building 7; 23 minutes before it happened.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite a press whitewash this story has become enormous online. The British public demand to know how BBC staff had information about the collapse of WTC7 over 20 minutes before it actually happened.
We demand that this issue be answered and that the BBC be held to public account in this matter.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
